title: No champion capsule from Lvel up(lv 40)
body:
Like in topic.
Leveled up from unranked lost game. Get notification of it but no capsule appear in loot.
I am not sure that it happen before with normal capsule on lower levels as I wasn't paying attention but this one happen for sure.
I restarted game hoping that its some sort of glitch or maybe my net did not work but still no capsule.

replies.body: I checked up on this for you, but it looks like that level 40 milestone capsule was already added and opened back on Dec 14. It gave you the Legend 1 Emote and a few champion shards, but definitely let me know if you were talking about a different account or something!
Damn. I think I write on wrong forum for wrong region. My account is on Nordic&East. Can you check it or do I need to make topic on N&E forum?

How could it was added when I just leveled recently. And not month ago.
I am confused.
Damn. I think I write on wrong forum  for wrong region. My account is on Nordic&East. Can you check it  or do I need to make topic on N&E forum?
